thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-AeroVironment Q3 Loss Per Share $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-AeroVironment Q3 Loss Per Share $0.04
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - AeroVironment Inc:
* AEROVIRONMENT, INC. ANNOUNCES FISCAL 2018 THIRD QUARTER RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.45 TO $0.65 * ‍REVENUE FOR Q3 OF FISCAL 2018 WAS $63.9 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 20% FROM Q3 FISCAL 2017​
* ‍AS OF JANUARY 27, 2018, FUNDED BACKLOG WAS $123.5 MILLION VERSUS $78.0 MILLION AS OF APRIL 30, 2017​
* ‍CONTINUES TO EXPECT TO GENERATE REVENUE OF BETWEEN $280 MILLION AND $300 MILLION IN 2018 ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
